Error.description:
We've unfortunately encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were visiting.
Error.title: Something went wrong!

IndexPage.description: This is a basic example that demonstrates the usage of next-intl with the Next.js App Router. Try changing the locale in the top right corner and see how the content changes.
IndexPage.title: next-intl example

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.

docs.description: Learn more about next-intl in the official docs.
docs.title: Docs

source.description: Browse the source code of this example on GitHub.
source.title: Source code

PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).
PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames

LocaleLayout.title: Credit Card
LocaleLayout.failed-to-copy: Failed to copy due to an insecure connection.

SignUpPage.title: Log in to your account
SignUpPage.email-invalid: Please provide a valid email address.

SignUpPage.disclaimer: I have read and agree to <terms>Terms of Service</terms>, <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

SignUpPage.login-session-expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again to continue.

KycStatus.verifying: Your KYC documents are currently being verified. Please check back again later.
KycStatus.title: Verifying
KycStatus.id-number-not-match: The number you entered does not match the one displayed on the ID document.
KycStatus.country-not-match: KYC country selected does not match the one displayed on the ID document.
KycStatus.photocopy: ID document can not be a photocopy, please check and try again.
KycStatus.digital-copy: ID document can not be a digital copy, please check and try again.
KycStatus.manipulated-document: ID document can not be manipulated, please check and try again.
KycStatus.part-of-document-hidden: ID document can not be partially hidden, please check and try again.
KycStatus.part-of-document-missing: ID document should be fully displayed, please check and try again.
KycStatus.multiple-people: Multiple People in the picture, please check and try again.
KycStatus.black-white: ID document is black and white, not valid for verification, please check and try again.
KycStatus.bad-quality: Image is not clear, please check and try again.
KycStatus.damaged-document: Document is damaged, not valid for verification, please check and try again.
KycStatus.not-a-document: Not a valid ID document, please check and try again
KycStatus.new: The KYC process has not yet been initiated.
